data.name: Tiger Knight: Empire War - Classic Pack
data.detailed_description:
Including:
VIP card (1 month), Gold 500, Flag x1
VIP can help add 30% more gains from each battle.
The flag symbolizes glory and merit. In ancient wars, only veteran or warrior with illustrious military exploits was qualified to wear flags.

Notice: each account can purchase this pack for only once. It is well worth the price!
This DLC is only available for one server only. For example, once the content is purchased and added to the NA server, it cannot be obtained on other servers again.
These items will be send to your in-game E-mail.

data.supported_languages:
English, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 32bit
  • Processor: 3.0 GHz Dual core or equipment
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx9 compliant graphics card with 1024MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7, 8 ,10 64bit
  • Processor: 3.7 GHz 4 core or equipment
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: directx11 compliant graphics card with 2048MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
